name: LAMP Stack Blog
desc: The Easy Blog site project is a simple PHP, CSS, and JavaScript project. Talking about the project, it has lots of features. A user can post news, blogs, photos. This project is a complete blogging site for the users where there are different categories. It contains a homepage from where users can check the latest news, from programmers and about upcoming programs. Thereâ€™s a separate tab for blog posts where users can easily check all their news and blogs. The viewer can comment using their accounts. Take note that this project is still in development so please report any kind of bug if you find.
